headline.main: NAVY IS SET TO ARM SHIPS, KNOX SAYS; Secretary Adds That Gun Crews Can Go on Merchantmen as Soon as They Reach Port GREENLAND PATROL ACTIVE Department Head Reveals Action to Prevent Any Further Nazi Incursions

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 15 -- Whenever Congress authorizes such action the Navy Department is ready and equipped to put guns and gun crews on all American merchant ships as rapidly as they can be put into port for the installations Secretary Knox told his press conference today.
abstract: Knox outlines navy plans; assumes all Maritime Comm-built vessel shave gun mounts
